title: Forkcast
description: Whisk away to a cloud-top world of snacks and surprises where cravings lead and your food persona awaits!

questions.text: You wake up in a cozy little cookie cabin in the clouds. Your stomach grumbles. What do you do first?

options.text: Dash outside barefoot to find the first food stand that's open—who has time to wait?
Take a deep breath, stretch, and boil some herbs for morning tea—let's not forget we're in a house made of literal food.

questions.text: The clouds part and reveal a floating market of foods from around the world. You only have time for one stop.

options.text: The one stall that sells things you've never even heard of—mystery is delicious.
The corner offering three-for-one deals, loyalty stamps, and free samples? Say less.

questions.text: While shopping in the floating market, someone invites you to lunch with a group of new people. How do you respond?

options.text: Bet! I'll bring extra snacks and juicy tea with me
Stranger danger but agrees out of peer pressure.

questions.text: During lunch, you're offered two enchanted utensils. One is a fork that speeds up every meal, and the other is a spoon that makes each bite last longer.

options.text: Fork, please—time waits for no snack.
Spoon—food should be savored and enjoyed.

questions.text: After a hearty meal, you decide to explore the town. How do you settle in?

options.text: Scout the area for the essentials—best prices and smart buys only.
Stick to the main road…Oooo is that bubble tea?

questions.text: During your exploration, you find a glowing map. One path leads to a mystery feast, the other to a well-reviewed diner.

options.text: Let's go off the grid—I want food I've never seen before.
I'm going where the ratings are high, the portions are respectable, and the reviews are thorough.

questions.text: Excited about your new findings, you can't wait to share this with your friends. How would you break the news?

options.text: Let's round everyone up! Group adventure, group bites, group pics!
Suggest takeaway—bundle deals and party packs hit different when shared.

questions.text: While walking back to your cabin, the Doof Police stops you. "Unauthorized snack detected. Show your verification."

options.text: *Sigh* Calmly explain your situation and predicament
Act blur and try to gaslight the police

questions.text: Regardless, you've been captured and brought to the Cotton Candy King. To lighten your sentence, you:

options.text: Tear up, sob dramatically, and offer the King a sweet bribe.
Sweet talk your way through it with maximum charm.

questions.text: "Relax," the King booms. "I see you wish to return home. What do you miss most?"

options.text: My friends, my family, the memories I've forged with everyone.
Adventure! New places, new foods, unfinished business!

questions.text: The King chuckles in acknowledgment. "Before I send you off, I shall grant you one magical food wish. What'll it be, traveler?"

options.text: A teleporting tiffin box that zaps rare eats from every corner of the globe—fresh and fast.
A magical wallet that refills itself with 1 for 1 bundles, food vouchers, and half-price coupons forever.

questions.text: At last, you're back home after an exhausting, flavor-filled journey. Where do you recharge?

options.text: 24hr fast food joint—quick, convenient, chaotic, and comforting.
A cinnamon-scented bakery where everything feels like a warm hug.

results.Flash Fry: Efficiency is your middle name! You value quick, convenient food that fuels your busy lifestyle without slowing you down.
results.Namastew: You're mindful about your food choices and appreciate the ritual of eating. You take time to savor flavors and enjoy each bite.
results.Loco Taco: You're always on the hunt for new and exciting flavors! Adventure and novelty drive your food choices and you're the first to try something unusual.
results.Big Bucks Bao: You're a savvy foodie who knows how to get the best value! You appreciate good deals and love to share your food finds with others.
results.Talkayaki: Social dining is your thing! You love sharing meals with friends and family, and food experiences are about the connections you make.
results.Boba Babe: Food is your comfort zone! Sweet treats and familiar flavors help you feel at home, and you're not afraid to indulge when needed.
